New Records: France secured a 2-0 victory over Belgium in the Nations League match
Key Match Events: Randal Kolo Muani scored the first goal for France in the 30th minute
Ousmane Dembele scored the second goal for France in the 57th minute
Belgium had a post saved by France in the 6th minute
Belgium had a chance saved by France in the 9th minute
Kylian Mbappe came on as a substitute and had three close chances
Post-Match Reflections: N'Golo Kante was instrumental in France's performance
The match helped France bounce back from their loss to Italy
